creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominately dark brown with red and tan dyed circles (around 1/4" in diameter each); multicolored embroidered designs along cloth panel stitches; sleeves continue straight out from shoulders and become wider as they reach arm opening; patch of blue cloth at each sleeve; each sleeve's end has a blue plastic bead tied to a tassel; dress has no neck hole cut
title: Dress
